description:
Are you a developer or engineering manager? Project administrator? Shared services team member? Are you involved in taking an idea and delivering it to market? If so, come attend this talk by Kohsuke Kawaguchi, CTO, and Harpreet Singh, VP of product management, at CloudBees.
Software doesnâ€™t simply eat the world - it is the people that create and deliver ideas that enable software to eat the competition. Harpreet and Kohsuke will talk about how Jenkins and the CloudBees Jenkins Platform simplify the lives of various personas that live and breathe Jenkins. They will on-board new Pipeline projects on Jenkins 2.0 using one of the biggest clusters of Jenkins using the CloudBees Jenkins Platform - Private SaaS Edition. They will also unveil CloudBees Jenkins Enterprise, an enterprise distribution of Jenkins. 

Finally, Kohsuke and Harpreet will talk about the future roadmap for Jenkins and the CloudBees Jenkins Platform. This will cover topics such as the impact of Blue Ocean on massive Jenkins clusters and delivery analytics. With delivery analytics, we are moving into a world where Jenkins provides insights into how quickly ideas move into production, and how quickly you can trace issues that negatively impact your ideas once they are in production.
title: Deliver Software at the Speed of Ideas with the CloudBees Jenkins Platform
